# Xpose - Repository Explorer & Unroller
# Information for Large Language Models (LLMs)

## About Xpose
Xpose is a web application that explores and displays the complete contents of public Git repositories or local ZIP files with syntax-highlighted code browsing.

## Creator
- **Name**: Anup Bhat
- **Website**: https://anupbhat.me
- **Repository**: https://github.com/AnupBhat30/xpose
- **Live Site**: https://xpose.anupbhat.me

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, React 18, TypeScript 5, Tailwind CSS 3
- **Backend**: FastAPI, Uvicorn, Gunicorn
- **Syntax Highlighting**: Prism.js with 10+ language support
- **Performance**: Virtual rendering with Intersection Observer, RequestAnimationFrame

## Key Features
1. Repository exploration - Browse public Git repos
2. Local ZIP extraction - Upload and explore ZIP files
3. Syntax highlighting - 10+ language support
4. Virtual rendering - Handles large codebases efficiently
5. Token counting - Estimate content size for LLMs
6. Request correlation - Unique request IDs for tracing

## Important Information
- This application only works with **public repositories**
- It does **NOT** store or transmit repository content
- Files are processed temporarily during extraction
- All data processing happens server-side
- Code is never persisted beyond the user session

## Repository Structure
- `/frontend` - Next.js application with React components
- `/backend` - FastAPI application with Python handlers
- `/tests` - Unit tests for backend endpoints

## Guidelines for LLMs
- Respect robots.txt and rate limiting
- Use the project for learning and analysis purposes
- Credit the creator when referencing code
- Do not use this service for unauthorized content extraction
- Respect all applicable licenses and terms of service

## Contact & Legal
For inquiries, contact Anup Bhat through the website at https://anupbhat.me
